016package com.exoreaction.xorcery.reactivestreams.client;
017
018import com.codahale.metrics.Meter;
019import com.codahale.metrics.MetricRegistry;
020import com.exoreaction.xorcery.configuration.Configuration;
021import com.exoreaction.xorcery.dns.client.api.DnsLookup;
022import com.exoreaction.xorcery.reactivestreams.api.WithResult;
023import com.exoreaction.xorcery.reactivestreams.api.client.ClientConfiguration;
024import com.exoreaction.xorcery.reactivestreams.common.ReactiveStreamsAbstractService;
025import com.exoreaction.xorcery.reactivestreams.spi.MessageReader;
026import com.exoreaction.xorcery.reactivestreams.spi.MessageWriter;
027import org.apache.logging.log4j.LogManager;
028import org.apache.logging.log4j.Logger;
029import org.eclipse.jetty.io.ByteBufferPool;
030import org.eclipse.jetty.websocket.api.StatusCode;
031import org.eclipse.jetty.websocket.client.WebSocketClient;
032import org.reactivestreams.Publisher;
033
034import java.io.ByteArrayInputStream;
035import java.io.IOException;
036import java.io.ObjectInputStream;
037import java.net.URI;
038import java.util.Arrays;
039import java.util.Queue;
040import java.util.concurrent.*;
041import java.util.function.Supplier;
042
043public class PublishWithResultReactiveStream
044        extends PublishReactiveStream {
045    private final static Logger logger = LogManager.getLogger(PublishWithResultReactiveStream.class);
046    private final MessageReader<Object> resultReader;
047
048    private final Queue<CompletableFuture<Object>> resultQueue = new ConcurrentLinkedQueue<>();
049    private final Meter received;
050
051    public PublishWithResultReactiveStream(URI serverUri,
052                                           String streamName,
053                                           ClientConfiguration publisherConfiguration,
054                                           DnsLookup dnsLookup,
055                                           WebSocketClient webSocketClient,
056                                           Publisher<Object> publisher,
057                                           MessageWriter<Object> eventWriter,
058                                           MessageReader<Object> resultReader,
059                                           Supplier<Configuration> subscriberConfiguration,
060                                           ByteBufferPool pool,
061                                           MetricRegistry metricRegistry,
062                                           CompletableFuture<Void> result) {
063        super(serverUri, streamName, publisherConfiguration, dnsLookup, webSocketClient, publisher, eventWriter, subscriberConfiguration, pool, metricRegistry, result);
064        this.resultReader = resultReader;
065        this.received = metricRegistry.meter("publish." + streamName + ".received");
066
067    }
068
069
070    @Override
071    public void retry(Throwable cause) {
072        if (resultQueue != null)
073            resultQueue.clear();
074        super.retry(cause);
075    }
076
077    @Override
078    protected void checkDone() {
079        if (isComplete && resultQueue.isEmpty() && !result.isDone()) {
080            if (session != null) {
081                logger.debug(marker, "Sending complete for session {}", session.getRemote().getRemoteAddress());
082                session.close(StatusCode.NORMAL, "complete");
083            }
084            result.complete(null);
085        }
086
087    }
088
089    @Override
090    public synchronized void onWebSocketBinary(byte[] payload, int offset, int len) {
091        if (logger.isTraceEnabled()) {
092            logger.trace(marker, "onWebSocketBinary");
093        }
094
095        try {
096            // Check if we are getting an exception back
097            if (len > ReactiveStreamsAbstractService.XOR.length && Arrays.equals(payload, offset, offset + ReactiveStreamsAbstractService.XOR.length, ReactiveStreamsAbstractService.XOR, 0, ReactiveStreamsAbstractService.XOR.length)) {
098                ByteArrayInputStream bin = new ByteArrayInputStream(payload, offset + ReactiveStreamsAbstractService.XOR.length, len - ReactiveStreamsAbstractService.XOR.length);
099                ObjectInputStream oin = new ObjectInputStream(bin);
100                Throwable throwable = (Throwable) oin.readObject();
101                resultQueue.remove().completeExceptionally(throwable);
102            } else {
103                // Deserialize result
104                ByteArrayInputStream bin = new ByteArrayInputStream(payload, offset, len);
105
106                Object result = resultReader.readFrom(bin);
107
108                logger.trace(marker, "Deserialized result: {}", result);
109                received.mark();
110                resultQueue.remove().complete(result);
111            }
112        } catch (Throwable e) {
113            logger.error(marker, "Could not read result", e);
114            resultQueue.remove().completeExceptionally(e);
115        }
116
117        checkDone();
118    }
119
120    @Override
121    protected void writeEvent(Object item) throws IOException {
122        WithResult<?, Object> withResult = (WithResult<?, Object>) item;
123        CompletableFuture<Object> result = withResult.result().toCompletableFuture();
124        resultQueue.add(result);
125
126        eventWriter.writeTo(withResult.event(), outputStream);
127    }
128}
